short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A way to save snippets of code in one easy interface.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save any snippets of information in one easy-to-use and accessible web resource all across Chrome. Using an easy-to-use interface, you can reliably organize and save nuggets of information. Usable on stack exchange sites including StackOverflow. Simply title your snippet if needed, highlight the snippet to save and with one click in the integrated menu, you can save to one centralized extension popup.
